薽字的基本解释

薽
zhēn
豕首，一种中药草。

薽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhēn］
［《廣韻》職鄰切，平真，章。］
豕首草，可入药。

薽字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薽； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1063第14
【唐韻】章鄰切【集韻】之人切，?音眞。【爾雅·釋草】茢薽，豕首。【疏】南人名爲地菘，又名蝦蟆藍，亦名蟾蜍蘭。　又【五經文字】吉延切，音鸇。義同。

薽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
薽字的起名意思

豕首草，可入药。

grass
Basic explanation of words
grass
zhēn
Pig head, a kind of Chinese herbal medicine.
grass
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhēn］
["Guangyun" Career Neighbors, Plain, Chapter. ]
The hog head can be used as medicine.
grass
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　薽; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1063 Page 14
[Tang Yun] Zhang Linqi [Ji Yun] the people cut,? Yin 眞. 【Erya·Shucao】Champignon, hog head. [Shu] The southern name is Disong, also known as Shrimp Blue, also known as Toad Orchid.　[Five Scriptures] Ji Yanqie, Yinhu. The same meaning.
